name: iPhone 12
description: The iPhone 12 features a Super Retina XDR display and A14 Bionic chip.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 comes with a stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a powerful Exynos 2100 processor.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch offers a brilliant Retina display, Intel Core i9 processor, and a spacious SSD.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 features an InfinityEdge display, Intel Core i7 processor, and a slim, lightweight design.

name: Sony BRAVIA X900H
description: The Sony BRAVIA X900H is a 4K Ultra HD TV with Triluminos display and Dolby Vision support.

name: LG OLED CX
description: The LG OLED CX is a 4K OLED TV with perfect blacks and stunning color accuracy.

name: Canon EOS R5
description: The Canon EOS R5 is a professional-grade mirrorless camera with 45 megapixels and 8K video recording capability.

name: Nikon D850
description: The Nikon D850 is a full-frame DSLR camera with 45.7 megapixels and 4K UHD video recording.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II is a wireless noise-canceling headphone with up to 20 hours of battery life.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 is a premium wireless headphone with     up to 30 hours of battery life and industry-leading noise cancellation.
